qoute: A long habit of not thinking a thing wrong, gives it a superficial appearance of being right
Fashion is the science of appearance, and it inspires one with the desire to seem rather than to be.
It is only in appearance that time is a river. It is a vast landscape and it is the eye of the beholder that moves.
Appearance rules the world.
At their first appearance innovators have always been derided as fools and mad men.
Beware, so long as you live, of judging men by their outward appearance.
Building a mechanical device for its appearance is like putting lace on a bowling ball.
A long habit of not thinking a thing wrong, gives it a superficial appearance of being right
Fashion is the science of appearance, and it inspires one with the desire to seem rather than to be.
It is only in appearance that time is a river. It is a vast landscape and it is the eye of the beholder that moves.
Appearance rules the world.
At their first appearance innovators have always been derided as fools and mad men.
Beware, so long as you live, of judging men by their outward appearance.
Building a mechanical device for its appearance is like putting lace on a bowling ball.
Don't judge men's wealth or godliness by their Sunday appearance.
First appearance deceives many.
I think I am one of those who can manage not to take on a completely different appearance under their own glance.
Neglect of appearance becomes men.
No one is so miserable as the poor person who maintains the appearance of wealth.
The beggar is the only person in the universe not obliged to study appearance.
The biggest fool in the world is he who merely does his work supremely well, without attending to appearance.
The biggest problem with every art is by the use of appearance to create a loftier reality.
The highest problem of any art is to cause by appearance the illusion of a higher reality.
The tragedy of our time is that we are so eye centered, so appearance besotted.
THINK. Think about your appearance, associations, actions, ambitions, accomplishment.
Truth - An ingenious compound of desirability and appearance.
We should look to the mind, and not to the outward appearance.
